expo.name: Menkiki
expo.description: Scan any food with AI and discover the best restaurants nearby serving exactly what you're craving.

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Menkiki uses your camera to scan and identify food, so we can help you find restaurants serving exactly what you're craving.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Menkiki uses your location to show you the closest restaurants where you can satisfy your craving right now.

plugins.cameraPermission: Menkiki uses your camera to scan and identify food, so we can help you find restaurants serving exactly what you're craving.

plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Menkiki uses your location to show you the closest restaurants where you can satisfy your craving right now.
